fractal

Class TriangleAverageLayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • fractal.Layer
      • fractal.TriangleAverageLayer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class TriangleAverageLayer
extends Layer
    A layer which uses a rendering method called 'Triangle Average Inequality'. Please refer to "Härkönen, Jussi: On Smooth Fractal Coloring Techniques" for more information
    Author:
    Calvin
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • TriangleAverageLayer

        public TriangleAverageLayer()
        Initializes the layer with some basic values. AutoBailout and AutoMaxIterations are false, is creates a description, maxIterations is 1000, bailout is set to 10^4
